solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int numSquares(int n) {--newline--        int[] dp = new int[n + 1];--newline--        Arrays.fill(dp, Integer.MAX_VALUE);--newline--        dp[0] = 0;--newline--        for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {--newline--            int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;--newline--            int j = 1;--newline--            while(i - j*j >= 0) {--newline--                min = Math.min(min, dp[i - j*j] + 1);--newline--                ++j;--newline--            }--newline--            dp[i] = min;--newline--        }        --newline--        return dp[n];--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
